title: Looking for Gold+ Jungler and Support!
body:
Hay guys! Looking for two (2) new players for my ranked team Dark Vengeance! Throughout the off season we had a rough patch with players getting along and a few people ended up leaving... 

But now I am looking for some new people to fill in the roles! I am looking for people who are Gold+ in solo ranking, and are also looking to improve in gameplay! 

*Roles required!*

* Jungler
* Support

*What you need! *

*  Skype for in game communications
*  Facebook for out of game communications
*  An OCE account in Gold+ solo ranking
*  Able to give criticism and receive just as well

If you have any other questions, or are looking to join the team, add me in game, or reply to this thread!

*EDIT:* Sorry guys, no longer looking for anyone to join this team!
